mapper.select: select * from tbl_board order by bno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) from (select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 limit #{countEnd}) board
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, dueDate = now() where bno = #{bno}
